title: Ryze, the Rune Mage, available now

replies.body: ITS TIME {{champion:26}} TO {{champion:13}} FROM ELO HELL TO ELO PARADISE

He is OP right now: tanky af, one shots anyone, massive range, ult is essentially invisible to the enemy team in team fights, way too mobile; animations also look like tourettes, which is OP. {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
